Hi, sorry if is the wrong section but I can't find an appropriate one.
How do I highlight forum players names in blue?

Hello @antipro, To 'ping' members (they receive a notification of being mentioned) type @ followed by the the username. You will see a drop down box appear, left click on the member you wish to ping and it will embed into the forum. Also this topic has been moved to Kerbal Network as it is more about the forum than the game.

@James Kerman thx James Kerman
my fault was that I copied/paste the name after the @, instead of type it, so this way it didn't work.

Edited October 8, 2020 by antipro

Yes. It's very particular.

You must type the @ symbol. You must type the name after it (no copy/paste!). You cannot without clicking move the cursor away from typing the name (though you can move it within) after you start. If you ever DO leave that area by mouse clicking, you must delete the entire name and start over, though you can leave the @ symbol.

And good luck getting any of that to work on a phone.
